Prepaid_Spend_Amortization_ScheduleObjec.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: A reference to a Prepaid Spend Amortization Schedule.  This is used to update an existing schedule.  If this is entered, then the Supplier Invoice reference cannot.

validation.validation: You can't use the Submit Prepaid Spend Amortization web service if you created the prepaid spend amortization schedule from an accounting adjustment.

description: A reference to a Supplier Invoice.  If this is used then the Prepaid Spend Amortization Schedule Reference cannot.

Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Default the Person making the comment to the processing person if not submitted via the web service.

Prepaid_Spend_Amortization_Schedule_Data.description: The reference id of the prepaid spend amortization schedule.  If this is entered, then the Supplier Invoice ID cannot.
The reference id of the supplier invoice this schedule is connected to.  If this is entered than the Schedule ID cannot.

Prepaid_Spend_Amortization_Installment_D.description: The reference to the installment that is being updated.
The date that accounting will use.  This must match the start date.

Prepaid_Spend_Amortization_Installment_L.description: The supplier invoice line this installment line references.  The supplier invoice line can also be a split line.

validation.validation: Referenced Supplier Invoice ([invoice]) does not match entered line:  [invoice line].
The selected Invoice Line is not Prepaid. Please select only prepaid lines for creating the Spend Amortization installments.

Prepaid_Spend_Amortization_Installment_L.description: Accounting Worktags of the installment line.

validation.validation: For supplier invoice lines tagged with a capital project worktag, the company of the invoice line must equal the company on the capital project.
Transactions for contingent workers cannot have contingent worker worktags on lines. Please remove the contingent worker worktag.
Company Selected: [comp] does not match on an Award Line in effect for Grant Worktag: [grant]
You can't add or remove billable project worktags to installments on a prepaid spend amortization schedule.

Prepaid_Spend_Amortization_Installment_D.description: A set of lines that make up this installment

Prepaid_Spend_Amortization_Schedule_Data.description: The set of installments that make up this schedule.

validation.validation: Enter an installment reference ID to update existing Prepaid Spend Amortization Installments.
Prepaid Spend Amortization Installment Reference provided doesn't belong to the Schedule.

description: An element containing a set of installments.

validation.validation: The number of installments submitted does not match the number of installments requested on the schedule.
The total amounts of the installments must equal the amount of the invoice:  [amt]
The sum of the installment lines must equal the amount of the associated invoice line:  [lines]
